Barbados: Sugar cultivation begins on the island.
Cambodia: Death of Ponhea Nur in suspicious circumstances. Followed by Padumaraja I, son of Outhei.
England: Long Parliament: The Parliament was convened.
India: Rani Karnavati of the Garhwal Kingdom repels and defeats invasion attempt by Mughal army of Shah Jahan.
Philippine: Universidad de San Felipe de Austria established as the first Public University in the Philippines
Spain: Portuguese Restoration War: The war began. The Iberian Union was dissolved.
Taiwan: The Dutch force Chinese people in Taiwan to pay a residency tax
